title: Nomad Survival (GX.games) Giveaway
description: Get Nomad Survival for free via Opera Gx and GX.games! Nomad Survival is a fun time-based auto-attacking Roguelite game. If you like Vampire Survivors don't miss this game!
instructions:
1. To claim the game you have to install Opera Gx (a free browser for gamers).
2. Go to GX.games via the GX corner button or the browser.
3 Sign in with your Opera account or create an account.
4. Click the button to claim the game.

title: Dying Light Enhanced Edition (Epic Games) Giveaway
description:
Grab the popular Zombie game, Dying Light for free on Epic Games Store! Dying Light is a First-person action survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by flesh-hungry zombies. Don't miss this opportunity!

Edit: Please note this game might be banned in some countries.
instructions:
1. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
2. Click the button to add the game to your library

2. Login with your Steam account.
